person.note: Barrister. Examiner for standing orders to the houses of parliament, magistrate, and land owner. Lived at Combe Hurst, Kingston upon Thames, Surrey. Uncle of Florence Nightingale.

note.p: Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/455/28/11
